oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tobacco field near Nashville, Tenn., between 1901 and 1907
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of a tobacco field near Nashville, Tennessee. Two people's heads are visible among the plants, one wearing a white hat and one holding an umbrella and wearing a reddish hat. Tobacco has always been a profitable crop for the state of Tennessee. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
